column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////When it comes to ramen
column2: I'm kind of boring and get the chicken based ramen dishes. Wonton Chicken Ramen or the Jinya Chicken Ramen are my favorites. But I tried some of my friend's Spicy Umami Miso Ramen and it was excellent! I really like that any of the ramen on the menu is pretty customizable
column3: with tons of additional toppings available and control over the spice level of most spicy dishes. Plus the portions are huge
column4: I always have some to take home.
